title: We Have Mow Problems on the Farm | Calm Lands One Tile Challenge Episode 16

tasks.task: Drive and operate farm machinery for land preparation, planting, and maintenance.
subtasks: Navigate fields to position farm equipment for mowing grass.
Use specialized mowers to cut grass between rows of trees.
Maneuver equipment to avoid damaging crops during harvest.
Adjust犁or equipment to alternate cutting paths when existing lines interfere.
Harvest grass for sale or feed, ensuring efficient collection with available resources.
Determine fertilizer needs based on soil analysis (grass yield).
Apply lime and fertilizer to correct soil pH and nutrient levels for optimal crop growth.
Plan tree management strategies (thinning, harvesting) to balance income and land use.
Consider introducing livestock (cows) for additional income streams via milk production.
Research and budget for additional farm equipment (sawmill, sprayer upgrades) to support long-term farm profitability.
Preside over farm costs and earnings, making informed financial decisions for future investments.
Operate and maintain farm vehicles and tools to ensure efficiency and safety.
